name: RoadTrip (Green Kettle Studio)
description:
After passing the bridge you're finally on the Pirt Island, and the last stretch of the road before the cabin you're gonna spend next two weeks of your vacations in. There's no one here, so no one will know about the copious amount of drugs that will be in use - might as well start now!

RoadTrip is a fairly short game created for the #AGBIC2018 game jam in which either you, or you and friends take turns driving a car to get to the cabin and spend the next two weeks high as hell. But beware! The road is treacherous and filled with pills that are sure to make it RoadTrippy!

Choose the length of the road, and go for it! If you're playing with friends, the controls of the car will switch between you at random intervals!

Controls:
P1: WSAD
P2: Arrow keys
P3: Controller 1
P4: Controller 2
To reset the car press SPACE!
